item.title: The Right Posture for Code Review (Repost — English Summary)
item.description: Repost summary of “What’s the right way to do Code Review?” — focus on clarity, empathy, and outcomes. CR is not power play; it’s a craft for improving code, systems, and teams. Review the code, not the person; discuss scenarios and trade‑offs; make each CR an opportunity to learn and teach.
